Package tps.tp1.pack2Arrays

Class P03WheelOfNames

  • java.lang.Object
    • tps.tp1.pack2Arrays.P03WheelOfNames

  • public class P03WheelOfNames
extends java.lang.Object
    P03WheelOfNames encapsulates a program that starts by asking the user for an input of ten full names, with one full name per line and each line having up to 120 characters. Each full name contains at least the first name and surname with a minimum of 4 characters each. The input procedures terminates when either the entire set of 10 full names has been inserted, or when the user inputs the "end" escape keyword (case-insensitive) after having already five validated full names inserted. Each time an invalid name is inserted, that name is discarded and the user is notified of that fact.

    After the input procedure, the name list is displayed. Then, the programme randomly generates, without repetitions, 10 new names by picking from the input list combinations of first names and surnames. The new generated names are then displayed.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pedro Fazenda
